channel.title: 317 PI equip slots
channel.description: I added new items to my client, and when I equip them they always go to the helmet slot. btw I added the item ids in the item.java file source sided where they are supposed to go to make it equip to the right slot. is there something else I need to do or is it just something wrong? anybody know a fix?

item.title: 317 PI equip slots
item.dc:creator: @ReaperXScape ReaperXScape
item.description:
@ReaperXScape wrote:

i fixed it with hardcode, thanks anyways

@ReaperXScape wrote:

well they equip to the right slots but they aren’t being read as full helms or full bodys
http://gyazo.com/3ab1314d87f805e3bbd8111967bf302f
yet again the codes in item.java dont work…

Read full topic

item.title: 317 PI equip slots
item.dc:creator: @bluedevil666 bluedevil666
item.description:
@bluedevil666 wrote:

  1. Go to Itemassistant.Java

  2. Search “if(c.duelRule[11] && targetSlot == 0) {”

  3. Right above that code add

     		switch (wearID) {
 		case ####://ItemID
 			targetSlot = #;
 		break;
 		}

			Hat:
				targetSlot = 0;
			Cape:
				targetSlot = 1;
			Amulet:
				targetSlot = 2;
			Weapons:
				targetSlot = 3;
			Body:
				targetSlot = 4;
			Shield:
				targetSlot = 5;
			Legs:
				targetSlot = 7;
			Gloves:
				targetSlot = 9;
			Boots:
				targetSlot = 10;
			Ring:
				targetSlot = 12;
			Arrows:
				targetSlot = 13;

Read full topic
